Affect Province with Anonymous Event:Raging Hearts
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
Fury will start to grow in the hearts of all people in an entire province. Those affected will soon start to kill and plunder their fellow citizens. A mage can target any province of his choice and those affected will not know who has cast this spell on them.
Population -5%, Unrest +60. Reported as a random event.
